content: Great post Darius. Journaling takes commitment and dedication but the results are so worthwhile. I set myself a 21-day challenge to get going and it’s stuck but months later there are still days when it feels more like a chore. I focus on the positive benefits to keep on track but it’s important to be flexible and adapt your style. There’s no one-size-fits-all approach and it’s easy to be put off by fixed formats that don’t work for you. The flexibility you advocate is spot on.
